Description: Use it with caution, the owner might want it back.

Description: The blood of thousands coats this axe.

Description: This weapon has seen a lot war. Who would guess...

Description: Odahviing! Hear my voice and come forth.

Description: You shall not steal, nor deal falsely.

Name: Thyrsus
Description: In thy right hand, and with thy right foot raise it.

Description: Is your brain ok?

Description: tip: hit the enemies!

Description: Songs tell legends about this axe.

Description: Some say, she appears to those who are not looking for it.

Description: Change is inevitable, growth is optional

Description: Justice shall prevail!

Description: A legend is sung of when England was young...

Name: Kusanagi-no-Tsurugi
Description: AKA Ame-no-Murakumo-no-Tsurugi.

Description: The punishment of desire is the agony of unfulfillment.

Description: Purity means to think nothing but holy thoughts.

Description: Better than a thousands hollow words, there is one word that brings peace.
